cause.description:
The Minnesota AIDS Project is a non-profit organization that provides education, advocacy and helpful services to the people of Minnesota. Services include transportation, loans, medical expense help and meals. These services are given to HIV/AIDS sufferers in Minnesota because of your donations, the Minnesota AIDS walk and the Every Penny Counts Foundation, among others.
1. HIV/AIDS can be cured, but until then, we will help those living through it now.
cause.mission: Help people in Minnesota with AIDS.
cause.name: Minnesota AIDS Project
